review.title: “If you are satisfied with just doing something and getting an ok salary for that this is a great place for you”
review.pros: Pros – lots of social benefitscompany pension planhome officeflextime - you can basically work whenever and wherever you want (at night, from home)lots of young colleaguescompany partiescompany cellphonediscount on telekom productspaid trainings if you want them
review.cons: Cons – salary not so greatwork is kind of boring / not coolmany people have nothing or not enough to dolots of bureaucracy due to deutsche telekommanagement is fixated on numbers: not reaching the company goals seems to be even worse than not making any money
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – get real. stop wasting money and time on useless talking and negotiating. Be more technology driven and try to really accomplish something with the customers instead of first promising them everything and later argue with them over everything you promised
